name: Auto Approve Pro
description: Auto-approve Telegram channel join requests using Pyrogram USER session (fast backlog drain + new requests).

SESSION_STRING.description: Pyrogram USER session string (the user must be admin in the channel)

INVITE_LINK.description: Channel invite link (https://t.me/+xxxx) or @username (only used if you update app.py to read env)

MAX_APPROVALS_PER_MINUTE.description: Approvals per minute limit (higher = faster, can cause FloodWait)
